caller_intent: Gary from Alliance Insurance is contacting Phil to address the non-renewal of his MSA insurance policy and gather information to secure new quotes. He aims to assess property details (roof age, home updates, security systems) to ensure accurate pricing.
resolution_steps: Asked Phil about the last roof installation date (2016, no recent updates).
Inquired about household changes (no new pets, pools, or trampolines; existing cat remains unchanged).
Checked for home improvements (no plumbing/electric updates, but new AC unit installed last month with same configuration).
Noted presence of ADT security system used regularly.
Committed to providing re-quotes by the next day and requested additional info if needed.
knowledge_required: Insurance underwriting factors (roof age, home modifications, security systems).
Policy renewal processes and carrier-specific requirements.
Impact of AC unit replacements on insurance quotes.
summary: Gary from Alliance Insurance contacted Phil to address the non-renewal of his MSA policy, gathering details about his home's condition (roof age, AC unit, security system) to secure new quotes. Phil provided key updates, and Gary committed to follow-up with options by the next day.
